snippet: A commission delivered a scathing verdict on the civic health of the city, citing widespread poverty, huge pension obligations and paralyzing traffic with no solution in sight.
abstract: Los Angeles 2020 Commission delivers scathing verdict on the city's civic health, citing widespread poverty and job stagnation, huge municipal pension obligations and several other shortcomings; report elicits strong reactions from civic leaders and others who feel city's fortunes are on the rise.

byline.contributor: Ian Lovett contributed reporting from Los Angeles.

lead_paragraph: A commission delivered a scathing verdict on the civic health of the city, citing widespread poverty, huge pension obligations and paralyzing traffic with no solution in sight.

headline.main: Report Finds Los Angeles at Risk of Decline
headline.print_headline: Report Finds a Los Angeles in Decline
